Home.connectNote: Connect with actual locals who reveal unique experiences you will not find in guidebooks.
Home.whySubtitle: Experience tourism the way it should be: personal, authentic, and sustainable.
Home.whyHiddenBody: Discover places only locals know, far from tourist crowds and guidebook cliches.
Home.whyVerifiedBody: All guides are reviewed and verified, so you can explore with complete peace of mind.
Home.whyPassionateBody: Connect with locals who genuinely love sharing their culture, stories, and traditions.
Home.whyImpactBody: Support local communities directly while exploring responsibly and sustainably.
Home.howSubtitle: Start your adventure in three simple steps.
Home.howStep1Body: Search for experiences by location, interests, or guide specialties. Filter by food tours, nature hikes, cultural walks, and more.
Home.howStep2Body: Read authentic reviews, check guide profiles, and message them directly to customize your perfect experience.
Home.howStep3Body: Meet your guide and embark on an authentic journey through hidden spots and local stories you will never forget.
Home.guideBody: Turn your local knowledge into meaningful connections and income. Join guides worldwide who share their passion with travelers.

HowItWorks.title: How LocalPath Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Your journey to authentic local experiences in three simple steps.
HowItWorks.step1Body: Search a wide range of experiences led by locals. Filter by location, interests, or guide specialties to find the perfect tour for you.
HowItWorks.step2Body: Review detailed guide profiles, read reviews from other travelers, and message guides to customize your experience to your preferences.
HowItWorks.step3Body: Meet your guide and embark on an unforgettable journey through hidden spots, local stories, and authentic cultures that will enrich your travel.
